message: @andrewgodwin getting a 503 service unavailabe .. no server is available to handle this request on one of my apps, mibooklist.ep.io ... curiously .. my other app is up
any ideas? my codebase had been working before, and i have done no recent changes, just visited the link from another computer/location
No problem; hosting without decent support isn't worth paying for...
Not sure what happened - looks like your runner died and the watchdog, which is off for an update (it was spamming people's broken sites with GET requests), is off at the moment
I suspended and un-suspended it and it seems to be fine now
Once we have the socket watchdog, ep.io should redeploy by itself
@andrewgodwin awesome, and thanks for the quick and detailed response as always
